items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: I recently wore the MEROKEETY Women’s Fall Long Sleeve Wedding Guest Dress, and I was really impressed. The fabric felt soft and cozy while still looking elegant, and the long sleeves gave just the right amount of coverage for a fall wedding. The silhouette was flattering without being too tight, and I easily accessorized it for a dressy-but-comfortable look. Overall, it made me feel put‑together and stylish without sacrificing comfort. Read more
items.author: caitlyn23

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a comfortable dress!
items.body: I bought this dress to wear for a fall wedding, and I am so glad I did! I purchased a size Medium (for reference I am 5'2" and 150lbs) in the color black. It fit perfectly and was so comfortable! The fabric was a little on the heavier side, which I didn't mind at all; I actually preferred it. The dress was well-made, really good quality. The off-the-shoulder style was on-trend without being too revealing. And it has pockets!! :) Read more
items.author: Shannon Luongo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its exactly as pictured
items.body: The dress is just as pictured. Very comfortable and a nice quality. The material is thick and the color is as pictured as well. Its gonna make a nice wedding guest picture. It also came in a timely matter just as it was listed too. Read more
items.author: Debbie Readling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this dress!
items.body: This dress was perfect. I wore it to a wedding that was outside so the material being a bit thicker was great. I’m 5’3 113lbs so the small fit nicely. This dress is truly wrinkle resistant which is a huge bonus. I purchased the navy blue but not the dark navy blue and it was so pretty. It was extremely comfortable too. Love love love. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Long Sleeve Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Long Sleeve Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, Brown, Navy, Pink, Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
